remarks: The aleph function has at least one fixed point.  Proposition 11.18 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 104.  See ~ alephfp for an actual example of a fixed point.  Compare the inequality ~ alephle that holds in general.  Note that if ` x ` is a fixed point, then ` aleph `` aleph `` aleph `` ` ... ` aleph `` x = x ` .  (Contributed by NM, 6-Nov-2004.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 15-May-2015.)
statement: alephfp2 $p |- E. x e. On ( aleph ` x ) = x $.
